comment.body:
> [erkan](#comment_2_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): sounds like lots of time wasted :-(

ya def

> [ks](#comment_3_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): Looks interesting (as a concept, I haven't looked at the software yet).

k. yea am liking it.

> [ks](#comment_4_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): I've been looking forward to the second season and I just watched S2E01. I think I've been expecting too much. I'll probably watch S2E02 tonight and if it's as disappointing as S2E01 I'l probably skip the rest. But let's seeâ€¦

k. I am enjoying it :)
oh nice. I hated archery but I love it now.

> [ks](#comment_5_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): I also don't have cable tv (or tv at all, for that matter). Fortunately, DR (the Danish Broadcasting Corporation) has several more or less official streams that can be watched with VLC (a friend of mine wrote a perl script that extracts the proper URLs from DRs pages that otherwise require Flash and then spawns VLC), so I've been watching my favourites: archery and diving. :)

Your friend is good with Perl.  Awesome
